name: INSERT
description: Use this command to replace temporary place-keeping symbols in an A type field with other A type fields. The general use of this command will be in inserting names, addresses, amounts, etc. into stock paragraphs, letters, etc. that can then be printed with this ‘personal’ information in it.

parameters.name: field_list
parameters.description: The fields/expressions that will be used when replacing the place-keeper values. The first field will replace place-keeper 1, the second field place-keeper 2, etc. Each INSERT value must be of A type. The placekeeper value is ‘\*’+number, i.e., \*1 or \*2, etc. Each INSERT field may be used multiple times within the into_field.

parameters.name: into_field
parameters.description: The name of the field that contains the place-keeping values that need to be replaced. Must be an A type field.
